name: Rate Own Post
author: nyasro

sections.description:
Rate Own Post is a plugin which adds new column ratings on your post edit page,
where you can have your own ratings for you own post.

  • Use shortcode tag [nyrating] to show 5 star rating box, which you can see on
    screenshots tab.
sections.installation:
This plugin is installed just like any other WordPress plugin.
More detailed installation instructions are available on the WordPress Codex.

If you want manual installation:

  1. Download Rate Own Post
  2. Extract rate-own-post folder.
  3. Upload this folder with files inside to ../wp-contents/plugins/
  4. Activate the plugin in Dashboard > Plugins
  5. Use shortcodes for require features.
  6. Enjoy the ratings. And then consider donating.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do

This plugin helps to keep your post rated so that viewers can know about priority post or top post.

Still have some questions ?

you can message us if you have any problem regarding this plugin or anything to ask.
nyasro@gmail.com
